creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: horizontal format with black on right side and red on left side, with vertical repeating scroll designs in white on black and black on red at center; imagery from left: squatting woman wearing a scroll patterned black and red dress and high heeled shoes; black bear wearing four beaded necklaces and holding light and dark blue scrolls; standing deer without antlers with a red, tan and black patterned cloth over its back; deer with antlers, lying down, wtih a white and black patterned cloth over its back and a line drawing of a building with a "TRADING POST" sign behind deer
medium: Acrylic, ink, graphite, and collage on Lokta paper
title: Trading Post
